outputs.output_descr: The project intends to realize the following: 1) deepen the multi-party parliamentary culture and develop greater awareness of parliaments oversight role of Government 2) strengthen the  capacity of parliamentary staff to better support members of parliament in their legislative role 3) strengthen the institutional capacity  for more effective monitoring/oversight of government action and increased legislative production 4) strengthening of fiscal oversight and increased transparency and accountability in public management 5) to further support parliament to scrutinize more effectively government action with respect to service delivery in priority development sectors related to the achievement of the MDGs, the use of foreign assistance, and the fight against corruption.

project_descr: Strengthening Parliamentary Capacity of Fiscal Oversight and Law Making
